full_threads.body:
Hi Rebecca,

We found the issue, it is the daylight saving time, we have updated the scripts and excluded the daylight saving time.

Can you try and verify if its working correctly?

Hi @joel . The way I understand it is, the daily rate will be 470 and it will be multiplied but the number of days right? so 470x4 = $1880. But the result shows $1036. So I have used the following test cases:

  1. April 3-6 (4days) - $1036 - incorrect
  2. April 3-4 (2days) - $940 - correct
  3. April 3-5 (3days) - $1410 - correct
  4. April 3-7 (5days) - $1295 - incorrect
  5. April 3-7 (6
  6. days) - $1554 - incorrect
Looks like correct total is only up to 3 days and 4days up are incorrect.
Question: Is there a setup backend, maybe a discount, if it's more than 3days?

@joel - received call from customer and tested this.

Something is happening on Apr 3 - Apr 6, they skips the 5 days.

I suspect it might have something to do with daylight savings changeover

Video recording here from 3 minutes to 5 minutes.
https://www.loom.com/share/e721602f017c478fb0f1c0c6ee65ae14

Please have @cindy test and sign off before sending anything back to customer.

Hi Rebecca,

We have made adjustment to the site. Can you please try again? and send a screenshot? Also can you try it in browser incognito mode?
https://argylehire.com.au/for-hire/access/boom-lifts/60ft-18-0-m-knuckle-boom-lift/

Hi Joel,

It still doesn't look to be working on our end. Our and our client's timezone is AEDT at the moment.

Kind Regards,

Rebecca Licciardello

Business Support Officer



T 1300 67 81 80 W argylehire.com.au

Hi Rebecca,

Thanks for the screenshots,

We have made updates to the site and we have cleared the site and server cache. Can you try and login and try the calendar now? Also what timezone are you on at the moment?

Hi Joel,

Looks like it still isn't working on our end.



I've also noticed that if I start it from the 3rd it stuffs up the calculations from 5 days -> 6 days (03/04-07/04 should be 5 days). So I'm unsure if it's something about this week that is messing with it?



I've messed around with it a bit and it looks like from the 7th the calculations are back to normal and working fine.



Not sure if this is any help.

Kind Regards,

Rebecca Licciardello

Business Support Officer



T 1300 67 81 80 W argylehire.com.au

PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL | The information contained in this email and any attachments is confidential to the addressee. If you are not the intended recipient, you must not peruse, use, disseminate, distribute or copy this email or attachments. If you have received this in error, please notify us by return email. The Company does not guarantee the security or reliability of this email or any attachments.

Hi Rebecca,

Thanks for that, we have made changes to calendar.

Can you please try now? also can you send a screenshot if it doesn't work

Hi Joel, 02/04/2025-06/04/2025 was correct in being 5 days, it was everything after 5 days is calculating incorrectly. For example, for 02/04/2025-07/04/2025 it was saying 7 days when it's meant to be 6, and this error is carried on for every hire period longer than 5 days. It is calculating the number of days correctly when the client tries to do a hire period of 1-5 days, but anything over is adding an extra day. It's meant to be:
  • 02/04/2025-02/04/2025 = 1 day
  • 02/04/2025-03/04/2025 = 2 days
  • 02/04/2025-04/04/2025 = 3 days
  • 02/04/2025-05/04/2025 = 4 days
  • 02/04/2025-06/04/2025 = 5 days
  • 02/05/2025-07/04/2025 = 6 days
  • 02/05/2025-08/04/2025 = 7 days
  • And so on
The calendar still appears to be having problems. Kind Regards, Rebecca Licciardello Business Support Officer T 1300 67 81 80 W argylehire.com.au PRIVATE AND CONFIDENTIAL | The information contained in this email and any attachments is confidential to the addressee. If you are not the intended recipient, you must not peruse, use, disseminate, distribute or copy this email or attachments. If you have received this in error, please notify us by return email. The Company does not guarantee the security or reliability of this email or any attachments.

Hi Rebecca,

Thanks for that. We have updated the calendar days calculation.

Before:
02/04/2025 to 06/04/2025 will equal to 5 days

After
02/04/2025 to 06/04/2025 will equal to 4 days

Hi Joel,

It's not the price that's the problem I don't think, it seems to be the calendar? It is recognising 6 days as 7 days, 7 days as 8, and so on and so forth. It is then calculating the price based off that incorrect number of days.

Kind Regards,

Rebecca Licciardello

Business Support Officer



T 1300 67 81 80 W argylehire.com.au

We are prioritizing this one, Do you have a masterslist of pricing for all the products?

Hi Joel,

As far as I can tell it is for every product.

Rebecca Licciardello

We are looking into this, Can you send which product is this?

Hi guys,

On the website it seems anything over 5 days is being charged with an extra day. Can someone please look at this urgently as clients are being overcharged. We noticed this since last night.


Kind Regards,


Rebecca Licciardello
